mapper.insert: INSERT INTO walk_setgoal (setgoal_date, setgoal_time, setgoal_distance, setgoal_create_datetime, time_achieve, distance_achieve, user_info_user_no) VALUES (date_add(now(), INTERVAL #{setgoal_day} DAY), #{setgoal_time}, #{setgoal_distance}, now(), 0, 0, #{user_info_user_no})
mapper.select: SELECT setgoal_no, setgoal_date, setgoal_time, setgoal_distance, setgoal_create_datetime, time_achieve, distance_achieve, user_info_user_no FROM walk_setgoal WHERE user_info_user_no=#{user_info_user_no} ORDER BY setgoal_create_datetime DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT setgoal_no, setgoal_date, setgoal_time, setgoal_distance, setgoal_create_datetime, time_achieve, distance_achieve, user_info_user_no FROM walk_setgoal WHERE user_info_user_no=#{user_info_user_no} ORDER BY setgoal_create_datetime ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE good.walk_setgoal SET time_achieve=#{time_achieve}, distance_achieve=#{distance_achieve} WHERE user_info_user_no=#{user_info_user_no} AND setgoal_no= (SELECT setgoal_no from (SELECT setgoal_no FROM good.walk_setgoal WHERE user_info_user_no=#{user_info_user_no} AND setgoal_create_datetime= (SELECT MAX(setgoal_create_datetime) FROM good.walk_setgoal WHERE user_info_user_no=#{user_info_user_no}) ) AS temp)
